page.title: 06SHOP PRICES COMPARED
page.content: Prices of 23 items at the village shops in Jackson Bridge and Hepworth were compared to those in three Supermarkets further away. There was a difference of Â£1.11(14%) between shopping in Hepworth and Asda. food other total Hepworth Â£7.81 Â£1.50 Â£9.31 Jackson Bridge Â£7.94 Â£1.19 Â£9.13 Lodges(Holmfirth) Â£7.00 Â£1.79 Â£8.79 Asda(Huddersfield) Â£6.67 Â£1.53 Â£8.20 Sainsbury(Hudds) Â£7.17 Â£1.56 Â£8.73 There were far more things to choose from at the supermarkets.We found the village shops stocked smaller sizes which cost more in the end eg. small coffee cost 49p for 25g in Hepworth but 79p for 50g in Huddersfield. However old people and those without cars might find the local shops cheaper and more convenient taking into account transport costs and time.
